title: Tourist Bungalow for Sale in Colombo 06
details:
The Building consists of lower ground level, ground level, 1st floor, 2nd floor. Total of 10,165 SQFT building area. The building has Intercom system facility, wireless Internet coverage (entire property) 8 channel CCTV security camera system, Solar electricity system that generates 1000 KWT production per month, solar hot water and Pressure Pump System.

Building is located on high ground and surrounded by retaining wall, boundary wall. The total Building is constructed with bricks, cement, steel roof with high quality ceiling and roofing sheets. Floors are natural granite, high quality porcelain tiles. Furniture and all wooden fittings are Teak, Kumbuk or Kittul. Doors and windows are either powder coated Aluminium or Teak Wood.
